name: Ia’Affrat
description: Ia’Affrat is a master manipulator with a powerful aura. His appearance evokes a sense of dread, marked by his ability to shift between humanoid and shapeless forms. His keen intellect and charisma make him a cunning combatant and strategist.
memorable: Ia’Affrat can inhabit and control humanoids, making them unwitting allies in battle while maintaining a powerful presence through his legendary actions.
goals: To dominate his foes, manipulate others, and maintain control over his individual fiends through telepathic communication.
relations: Might serve or lead other fiends, often interacting with other creatures in a tactical manner.
environment: Typically found in dark, corrupted areas, or places of evil influence, where he can exert control over lesser creatures.
strengths: High intelligence and charisma make him an effective spellcaster and manipulator. His numerous immunities and resistances enhance his survivability.
weaknesses: Ia’Affrat is vulnerable to cold damage, which can be exploited in combat.
attacks: Can make three Bite or Burning Claw attacks, or four Flaming Insect Bolt attacks, inflicting significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Collective Mind allows telepathic communication with all individual fiends, enhancing tactical coordination in battle.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet and an impressive passive perception of 19.
skills: Noteworthy skills include high proficiency in Deception and Arcana, showcasing his expertise in manipulation and magic.
additional_information: Immune to bludgeoning, fire, piercing, poison, and slashing damage.
Can produce a smoke shroud that obscures vision for enemies.
Can control humanoid bodies, using them as allies.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Can transform into a shapeless form when severely injured.
spellcasting: Ia’Affrat excels in spellcasting, utilizing a variety of spells enhanced by his high intelligence.
test_queries: powerful swarm fiend with smoke abilities
Large fiend with significant spellcasting skills
